00127 //! construct a row vector from a given auxillary array
00128 template<typename eT>
00129 inline
00130 basic_rowvec<eT>::basic_rowvec(const eT* aux_mem, const u32 aux_length)
00131   {
00132   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00133   
00134   basic_mat<eT>::set_size(1, aux_length);
00135   arma_check( (basic_mat<eT>::n_elem != aux_length), "basic_rowvec(): don't know how to handle the given array" );
00136 
00137   syslib::copy_elem( basic_mat<eT>::memptr(), aux_mem, basic_mat<eT>::n_elem );
00138   }

00199 //! construct a row vector from given a diagview
00200 template<typename eT>
00201 inline basic_rowvec<eT>::basic_rowvec(const diagview<eT>& X)
00202   : basic_mat<eT>(X)
00203   {
00204   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00205   
00206   std::swap( access::rw(basic_mat<eT>::n_rows), access::rw(basic_mat<eT>::n_cols) );
00207   arma_debug_check( (basic_mat<eT>::n_rows > 1), "basic_rowvec(): incompatible dimensions" );
00208   }
00209

00211 
00212 //! construct a row vector from given a diagview
00213 template<typename eT>
00214 inline
00215 const basic_rowvec<eT>&
00216 basic_rowvec<eT>::operator=(const diagview<eT>& X)
00217   {
00218   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00219   
00220   basic_mat<eT>::operator=(X);
00221   
00222   //std::swap( access::rw(basic_mat<eT>::n_rows), access::rw(basic_mat<eT>::n_cols) );
00223   arma_debug_check( (basic_mat<eT>::n_rows > 1), "basic_rowvec(): incompatible dimensions" );
00224   
00225   return *this;
00226   }

00335 basic_rowvec<eT>::set_size(const u32 in_n_elem)

00343 
00344 template<typename eT>
00345 inline
00346 void
00347 basic_rowvec<eT>::set_size(const u32 in_n_rows, const u32 in_n_cols)
00348   {
00349   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00350   
00351   basic_mat<eT>::set_size( (std::min)( u32(1), in_n_rows), in_n_cols );
00352   
00353   arma_debug_check( (in_n_rows > 1), "basic_rowvec::set_size(): incompatible dimensions" );
00354   }
